properties.Name: PatientActivity
properties.Description:
The Activity(s) that a specific Patient has acknowledged was identified or recorded as of the indicated date.

Activities, Interests and Opinions are the foundation of Psychographics and Psychographic Segmentation.     Activities, Interests and Opinions equate to 'lifestyle'.    Activities, Interests and Opinions (AIO) are the basis for understanding consumer buying behavior as a function of their lifestyle.

Activities describe what a consumer 'does', such as occupation, hobbies, entertainment.

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of AIO's to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions. 

Ex:
Activity =  "Cooking"
Activity Type = "Personal Interest"

Activity =  "Golf"
Activity Type = "Personal Sports

Activity =  "Mutual Fund Investing"
Activity Type = "Finance"

Sales, marketing and advertising activities are often planned for or targeted at groups involved in or interested in specific activities.

Columns.Name: PatientId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Patient.

Columns.Name: ActivityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Activity.

Columns.Name: Date
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the associated information is reported, recorded or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: ServiceProviderId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Service Provider.
